input: Write a text message inviting a friend out.
output: Good friend, dost thou hear the verdant call? Of moonlit nights in fields where flowers grow? Yea, then bideth ye no longer at thine ease within? Let us eschew the bustling haunts of common care and seek instead the solace of calm skies above, beneath which we may wander as two spirits free. Come, thou and I shall journey forth with a heart's content, to revel in that which brings us both joy unmeasured. What sayest thou? Will fairest thou grant this boon, that our souls may dance together on the wings of moonlight and verdant fields?
